message: I propose we split the money 700000 for me and 300000 for you. Let's see if you agree.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering we both have equal say in the division. Let's get this done in round 2!
Considering the inflation, I propose an equal split of the money, each receiving $500000. This ensures fairness and prevents any potential loss due to decreasing value.
